rooms.description: An open entrance hall with wheelchair accessible ramp and a reception area. The space is designed to ensure ample natural light and ventilation.
Spacious living room adjacent to the kitchen, featuring large windows for natural light. Vastu considerations include alignment of the main entrance to the north or east.
Open dining space integrated with the living area, designed to promote family interaction and social gatherings.
Modern kitchen adjacent to the dining area, equipped with adequate ventilation. The layout respects local building norms for safety and hygiene.
Dedicated servant's quarters located on the ground floor corner for convenience, ensuring privacy and comfort. Includes a small attached bathroom.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to allow smooth wheelchair access, with an integrated ramp and automatic doors if possible.
Multiple large windows on the south and east facades to maximize natural light and cross ventilation. Designed in compliance with local building regulations and Vastu principles.
